com.rattat.micro.game.frog.board
Class BoardModel

java.lang.Object
  com.rattat.micro.game.frog.board.BoardModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
HomeListener
public class BoardModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements HomeListener

Holds everything needed to actually play the game. Instances of channels (roads, river lanes), the status screen, the frog moved by the user etc.

Author:
william@rattat.com

Field Summary
static int CELL_SIZE
          width / height of one cell in the game in pixels (board is approx 15 * 15 cells)

          Frog moving down
